Text:
Once again and again and again...+1...A10-V10...
Thanks a lot for sharing your «unique-piece-of-art» work. We (your regulars) understand the time and love you put on your shares and that's what makes your gifts so appreciated...
Live long and Prosper Twentyforty.

NOTE: special thanks for keeping original language (mine lol)

Yes my friend, it may sound strange, but I think on that whenever I up some movie on French. Two my personal best movies of all times happen to be French, Nikita and Betty Blue, but rest are Anglo-American movies.

I am actually downloading both of your «best» suggestions even if i already saw them a couple of times...thanks for the reminder...great movies...and by the way, both of them uploaded in 2010 (aug. and sept.) are still running...
: )
